page.title: 14EVENTS IN HEMINGBY.
page.content: The bridge in Hemingby over the beck had to be rebuilt to carry traffic. A few people in Hemingby protested about it in vain.During the building the local farmer, Mr.Read opened his farm road so that drivers could reach the village. The bridge was eventually finished after six months and a get-together was organised for the opening of the bridge. The bridge was opened in June 1984 by Micheal Read. He performed the ceremony of cutting the ribbon. Drinks were served in the village hall. Funds raised were used by the Parish Council.Hemingby garden fete is held every year on a Saturday in June.There are lots of fun,games an competions. The stall are jumble,tombolar,cake stall.Wehave sports later on in the day too.The day end with a tug of war. Money raised goes to Church funds.
